sentences.sentence: When I was 11 my mother sent me to elocution lessons.
sentences.translation: 在我11岁的时候，妈妈把我送去学习演说技巧课程。

sentences.sentence: What do you teach? -speech, elocution and poise.
sentences.translation: 你教什么？ -谈吐，演讲以及仪态。

sentences.sentence: All her elocution lessons were just a mask. She was a chiseler from the day she was born.
sentences.translation: 她所有的语言艺术课都是烟雾罢了，从她出生的那天起，她就是个骗子。
